content: change color if desired *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 12 sts round 22 k round 36 k round 23-25 p rnds 37-38 ribs change color if desired k round 39 *kfb repeat from * to end of round 24 sts *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 60 sts round 26 round 40 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 48 sts round 27 round 41 *k1 p1 m1p repeat from * to end of round 36 sts *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 36 sts round 28 round 42 *k1 p2 repeat from * to end of round *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 24 sts round 29 round 43 *k1 p2 m1p repeat from * to end of round 48 sts *k2tog repeat from * to end of round 12 sts round 30 round 44 *k1 p3 repeat from * to end of round *k2tog repeat from * to end of round 6 sts round 31 round 45 *k1 p3 m1p repeat from * to end of round 60 sts round 32 step no 2 finishing all sizes cut yarn leaving 8 tail thread through rem sts but do not close fill stem with plastic pellets and stuff top with fiber fill pull to close then weave in rem end step no 3 care hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel p 05 blue sky fibers abbreviations approx approximately ndl s needle s dpns double pointed needles p purl k knit rem remaining k2tog knit 2 stitches together repeat repeat kfb knit into the front and back of round s round s stitch st s stitch es lli left lifted increase insert left * repeat the directions between needle into top of stitch one row the asterisks as many times as below first stitch on right indicated needle knit this loop m1p make one purlwise insert left needle from back to front under strand between last stitch worked and next stitch on left needle purl this loop through the front p o box 88
